Class TextButton

java.lang.Object
  




public class TextButton
extends greenfoot.Actor

A Generic Button to display text that is clickable. This should be added to, and controlled by, a world.

Version:
v0.1.5
Author:
Jordan Cohen

act

public void act()
Will run when act or run is pressed. If mouse clicks on button, image will flash to a different color.
